objective.body: Worked in web2 for the longest, now working my way up through the upcoming web3 and decentralized apps.
objective.heading: Web and Blockchain Developer

items.summary:
Developed a ML model for content recommendation (movie, series, TV shows) based on 
preferance (as input) provided by the user.
Used **K-nearest ML algorithm** on "Bag of words" concept based on keywords related to content.
Used **HTML, CSS, Javascript** in the front end and **NodeJS** in the back end.
items.title: Movie Recommendation Engine

items.summary: Developed an application using **vanilla CSS, JS, HTML** in front end and **NodeJS** in back end, where user can play around and create a palette with variable number of colours which will be saved on a remote **MongoDB cluster**.
items.title: Pablo's Palette

items.summary:
Developed a site where one can create a polling base and post a question to ask for the votes of Participants.
Used **MERN** stack for the purpose.
items.title: Polling site

items.summary:
Deployed a **decentralised application** to perform inter-account transaction of ethers over **ropsten testnet**.
Built **smart contracts** with ethereum's **solidity**.
Developed front end GUI using **React, Tailwind, CSS**.
Used **nodejs** in the back end.
items.title: Cryptrade

items.summary:
Freudian Paradox is a technical club at NIT Trichy, aimed towards the study of cognitive sciences and psychology. I'm in PR and mathematical modelling department of the club.
We also work towards LGBTQ+ community, practicing identity-affirming clinical social work to create an inclusive, safe space for all.
